title: Magnerobo Ga-Keen
synopsis: Dr. Kazuki, who perceived of an invasion of Earth by the Izaru people builds a robot based on the science of magnetism and sphere joint theory. Undergoing a dangerous augmentation process, Dr. Kazuki's daughter Mai becomes the pilot of "Mighty" or "Magnetman Minus". Takeshi Houjou becomes the pilot of "Puraiza" or "Magnetman Plus".
characters: ['Kazuki, Mai', 'Houjou, Takeru', 'Kazuki, Mamoru', 'Mine Hakase', 'Izawaru Hoshi Teiou', 'Hoshi Hakase', 'Shadow Taichou', 'Hizen, Kaoru', 'Cockrow Shougun', 'Houjou, Touru']
